clues.text: Westminster, Md. was an important Union supply base during this July 1863 battle 20 miles north in Pennsylvania

rounds.comments: (Alex: Each response is a place whose name is found in the text of the clue.)

rounds.text: On September 25, 2019, searches on merriam-webster.com for the definition of this 3-word Latin term increased by 5,500%
